name: Cruel
summary:
In the not so distant future, the world is on the brink of catastrophe after the release of a ground-breaking soft drink turns people into jibbering wretches. As one of the few left remaining to navigate the wastes left behind, you catch wind of a rumour of the addictive recipe concealed within the ruins of an abandoned hotel protected by a strange evil cult.

As you embark on this mission, what mysteries will you discover in the quest for the ultimate power?

SHOOT, SMACK, KICK and SLIDE

Fight your way through 10 floors with powerful guns, crunchy melee weapons and a mighty kick. Although you'd better be fast, as you only have one life, and you're on the clock!

Drinks are everything

Offering healing, upgrades, and other dark powers, drinks are the only think of value left in this world. It's up to you on how to use them.

Upgrades
Visit the trader at the end of each run to equip powerful upgrades. But be warned; power comes at a price!
